pg004_services.title: IT Business
pg004_services.desc: We cater to a wide range of fields centered on finance, insurance, public services, and social infrastructure, providing comprehensive services from business applications to infrastructure construction, cloud services, and network operations.

fields.text: 【Industries】
Finance: Banking, Trust Banks, Securities, Credit Cards
Insurance: Life Insurance, Non-life Insurance, Cooperatives
Public Sector: General Administrative Services, Welfare, Standardization Support, Next-gen DX
Infrastructure: Cloud (AWS/Azure), Server Construction, Networks
Others: Telecommunications, Embedded Systems (Automotive/IoT), SAP, Salesforce
【System Types】
Open Systems, Mainframe, Android, iOS
【Development Technologies】
Java, C#, .NET, Typescript, Python, Cobol, C/C++
Intra-mart, RPA, Ab Initio
AWS/Azure, Unix/Linux, Windows, Mainframe Environment Construction, Network Construction

pg004_services.title: Real Estate Business
pg004_services.desc: While our main focus is on the IT business, we are also expanding into the real estate sector, covering sales, construction, and leasing.

fields.text: Land/Apartment Sales
Construction/Condominium Development
Leasing of Investment Properties such as Shops

pg004_services.title: Key Development Achievements
pg004_services.desc: The following are the main areas we have worked on in the past.

fields.text: Business Application Development: Finance (Banking, Credit Card, Securities), Insurance, Core Systems for Life & Non-life Insurance
Public Sector DX: Public systems for local governments, DX support for municipalities using generative AI
Embedded Systems: In-vehicle Audio, Autonomous Driving Control & Verification
Telecommunications: Development & verification for communication equipment
Infrastructure construction & development using cloud environments (AWS / Azure)
On-premise infrastructure construction, operation, and maintenance
Smart City related projects
Cloud services for transportation, food safety, and education
E-money, mobile payments, and internet payments
Support for local business of Japanese companies in China

projects.title: Internet Banking Infrastructure Construction
projects.responsibility: AWS Environment Setup (EC2, S3, EBS, VPC)

projects.title: Regional Bank Joint Center: Deposits, Remittances, Lending
projects.responsibility: Detailed Design to Integration/System Testing, Maintenance

projects.title: Core Banking & Peripheral System Development
projects.responsibility: Requirement Analysis, Design, Development, Testing, Implementation

projects.title: Life Insurance: New Policy System Revamp
Non-life Insurance: Policy Management & Support System
Insurance Policy Management and Claims Processing
Municipal DX: Smart City Web Portal
